devnet_status.highlight: DevNet1 successful: most clients syncing, minimal forks with EVM fuzzer
DevNet2 focus: optimizations testing, not blocking on 7928 spec

client_optimization_updates.highlight: Geth and Besu: flags ready for parallel execution and batch I/O
Nethermind: working on parallel execution and state root computation

testing_and_benchmarking.highlight: Shadow fork and BloatNet testing planned for optimization impact
OpenTelemetry metrics spec proposed for standardized BAL performance tracking

spec_clarifications.highlight: Engine API methods needed: CL pruning requires EL-stored BAL retrieval
Optional BAL field enables CL deduplication during sync without blinding

malicious_block_handling.highlight: Malicious BAL attack: garbage storage slots cause wasted batch I/O
Without transaction indices, blocks validated only after full execution
Three solutions: do nothing, remove state locations, or add indices
First-access indices increase size 4%, enable early invalidation

organizational.highlight: Receipt change for 7778 reverted; gas spent remains in receipts

action_items.action: Test batch I/O impact on BloatNet for future state sizes
Create malicious BAL block benchmark scenarios
Add receipts to test fixtures for debugging

decisions.decision: Keep engine API methods as specified; revisit optional BAL later
Malicious block handling postponed to DevNet3; no changes for DevNet2
